page.title: 07 Lucas B'ham
page.content: The largest factory in our area is Lucas, it is situated in Formans Road and employs 1000 people. It is the transport division for the Lucas Group and both heavy goods vehicles and vans are based there. The factory produces components for the home market and export. It manufactures batteries, die castings, which requires a foundry, and plastic mouldings which are the light and indicator covers. The factory has its own canteen facilities but it shares its recreation facilities with the whole Lucas Group. In recent years there have been suggestions that the Lucas factory poses serious health hazards during the manufacture of batteries from the lead pollution in the air.
